summary: This is an email forwarding a courtesy copy of an ECF filing in the case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)). The email is from Bobbi C. Sternheim, an attorney, to multiple recipients, including prosecutors and other defense attorneys, regarding legal proceedings against Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: ECF Filing in U.S. v. Maxwell
events.description: An ECF (Electronic Case Filing) was made in the case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)). A courtesy copy of this filing is being forwarded via email.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated April 30, 2021, forwarding a legal filing in the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)).
Bobbi C. Sternheim, an attorney, is the sender, indicating she is involved in the defense or related legal matters for Ghislaine Maxwell.
The email is addressed to multiple legal professionals, including Christian Everdell, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca, suggesting a coordinated legal team or communication with prosecutors.
The attached filing is from April 29, 2021, showing ongoing legal proceedings in the Maxwell case at that time.
